SEARCH

Uses of Package
com.github.hanyaeger.core

Packages that use com.github.hanyaeger.core
Package
Description
com.github.hanyaeger.api
Classes and packages that are part of the public API of Yaeger.
com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities
All classes, interfaces and enumerations that are related to entities and their behaviour.
com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.impl
All (abstract) implementations of YaegerEntity that can be used on a YaegerScene.
com.github.hanyaeger.api.scenes
All classes, interfaces and enumerations that are related to scenes.
com.github.hanyaeger.core
 
com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities
 
com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities.motion
 
com.github.hanyaeger.core.factories
 
com.github.hanyaeger.core.media
 
com.github.hanyaeger.core.repositories
 
com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.delegates
 
com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.splash
 
  • Classes in com.github.hanyaeger.core used by com.github.hanyaeger.api
    Class
    Description
    Activatable
    Implementing Activatable denotes the Object can, and usually must, be activated before it can be used.
    DependencyInjector
    Implementing this interface states that this Object requires injection of dependencies.
    RootPaneProvider
    A RootPaneProvider is capable of providing the Pane that should be used as the root pane for all other children of Node that are part of the YaegerScene.
    TimerListProvider
    Implementing the TimerListProvider interface guarantees that a List of instances of Timer is available.
    Updatable
    Implement this interface to be updated every cycle of the game loop.
  • Classes in com.github.hanyaeger.core used by com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities
    Class
    Description
    Effectable
    By implementing the interface Effectable, it is possible to apply various effects on both a YaegerScene and a YaegerEntity.
    Initializable
    Stating an Object is Initializable exposes the Initializable.init(Injector) lifecycle hook.
    TimerListProvider
    Implementing the TimerListProvider interface guarantees that a List of instances of Timer is available.
    Updatable
    Implement this interface to be updated every cycle of the game loop.
    UpdateDelegator
    An Updatable that delegates the Updatable.update(long) to an Updater.
    Updater
    An Updater contains a List of Updatable to which the update method will be delegated.
    YaegerGameObject
    The abstract base class of both the YaegerEntity and StaticScene and contains the shared behaviour.
  • Classes in com.github.hanyaeger.core used by com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.impl
    Class
    Description
    Effectable
    By implementing the interface Effectable, it is possible to apply various effects on both a YaegerScene and a YaegerEntity.
    Initializable
    Stating an Object is Initializable exposes the Initializable.init(Injector) lifecycle hook.
    ResourceConsumer
    Implementing a ResourceConsumer exposes a default methode that can be used to acquire the absolute path to a resource available on the class path.
    TimerListProvider
    Implementing the TimerListProvider interface guarantees that a List of instances of Timer is available.
    Updatable
    Implement this interface to be updated every cycle of the game loop.

    Class
    Description
    Activatable
    Implementing Activatable denotes the Object can, and usually must, be activated before it can be used.
    Clearable
    Denote that this Object can be cleared.
    DependencyInjector
    Implementing this interface states that this Object requires injection of dependencies.
    Destroyable
    Denote that this Object is Destroyable and hence ensures maximum Objects eligible for Garbage Collection.

    By implementing the interface Effectable, it is possible to apply various effects on both a YaegerScene and a YaegerEntity.

    Stating an Object is Initializable exposes the Initializable.init(Injector) lifecycle hook.

    Updater
    An Updater contains a List of Updatable to which the update method will be delegated.
    YaegerConfig
    An encapsulation of the various configuration settings that can be applied to a Yaeger game at start-up.
    YaegerGameObject
    The abstract base class of both the YaegerEntity and StaticScene and contains the shared behaviour.
